name: Power Out
description:
---Synopsis---

There's no oil left on the planet GOAP ! That is why the professor Wata created N3-M0, an android to explore other planets to find fuel. Unfortunately, her spaceship, due to a lack of energy, crashed on the planet Pangolerf, a planet without this precious oil that she seeks. She will need to find another way to recharge her batteries in order to go home !

---Controls---

-WASD/ZQSD - Move

-Mouse - Aim

-Left click - Shoot

Tip:

-The Dynamo gun's battery is charged with N3-M0's movements. Run and Gun!

---About---

Power Out  was made for the Complexity Game jam 2022 with the topic : Reset,Reboot, Re-energize.

  • Programming:  Damien Corre, Dorian Lallemand
  • 2D Artist : David Sommereisen
  • 3D Artist : Gustin Vilrus
  • Narrative Design / UI: Damien Tsong Chin Chuen
